Author: Koenari
Name: Himbeertoni Raid Tool
Description: A collection of useful tools for RaidGroups, including loot management
Changelog:
change: Several updates to Ui to make usage easier
new: can periodically update gersets from etro
new: you can now edit a characters tribe
change: data is now saved more often and is therefore more resilient to crashes of FFXIV
fixed: weapon tokens were distributed wrongly
fixed: lootmaster window may show before login
fixed: item level may be wrong
